H0.text: Who wrote the plays 'The Real Inspector Hound' and 'Arcadia'. Tom Stoppard's contemporary, Alan Ayckbourn

H1.text: Who wrote the plays 'The Real Inspector Hound' and 'Arcadia'. The renowned playwright and poet, Harold Pinter

H2.text: Who wrote the plays 'The Real Inspector Hound' and 'Arcadia'. The celebrated author and playwright, Michael Frayn

H3.text: Who wrote the plays 'The Real Inspector Hound' and 'Arcadia'. Stoppard

A5.text: Stoppard's plays include The Real Inspector Hound.
